actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Water Resources Development Act of 1986 to provide for Federal cost-sharing of water projects, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Water Resources Development Act of 1986 to change the non-Federal share of costs for municipal water supply for flood control projects from 100 percent to 50 percent.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Water Resources Development Act of 1986 to provide for Federal cost-sharing of water projects, and for other purposes.
